overview: Jennifer Beever is a marketing consultant/CMO for Hire for geeks, scientists and engineers. She drives marketing traction and increased sales for B2B companies that want to grow faster. Jennifer is an Inbound Marketing Certified Professional with Honors Distinction, with a detailed understanding of email marketing, basic and advanced search engine optimization, PR, Twitter, LinkedIn, Facebook, blogging, lead nurturing, conversion and inbound marketing analysis. Since 1998 she has been planning and executing online marketing strategies and traditional marketing since 1983, including print, TV, radio advertising, direct mail, trade shows and PR.
